pr_title: Move small internal package under common

timeline.bodyText: I would make the internal package io.opentelemetry.api.internal so we only have one internal prefix to deal with (e.g., exclude from javadocs). FWIU, having an internal package across multiple artifacts is fine JPMS-wise since they're not public.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: Not sure how to handle the java9 module package name then...
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: I don't think it should matter since it's not public - the java 9 name is still io.opentelemetry.api.common. Technically moving it out may even hide the packages from Java 9 module users (though I've never tried using it 😆 )
replies.author: anuraaga

timeline.message:
Move small internal package under common
